content.question: Scholars have theorized which of the following about the stylized animals painted on the vessel?

choices.label: They represent the same animal-headed gods found during excavations at a nearby temple.
They reference mythic animals that are described in the culture’s epic literature.
They refer to hunting rituals linked to seasonal patterns of animal migration.
They represent both the wild and the domesticated animals of an agricultural society.

content.answer: They represent both the wild and the domesticated animals of an agricultural society.

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
